AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

EnforcedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is paused.

ExpectedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is not paused.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC20 token failed.

Initialized(uint64).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

returns._0: bool The current pause state of the contract

params._newFeePercentage: The proposed new fee percentage (in basis points, e.g., 100 = 1%)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._newFeeRecipient: The new address to receive marketplace fees

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._newPrice: The new price in HONK tokens

params._recipient: The address to send the token to
params._token: The address of the ERC721 token contract
params._tokenId: The ID of the token to withdraw

params._amount: The amount of HONK tokens to withdraw

ERC721Withdrawn(address,uint256,address).notice: Emitted when an ERC721 token is withdrawn by the owner

FeePercentageExecuted(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when a proposed fee percentage is executed

FeePercentageProposed(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when a new fee percentage is proposed

FeePercentageUpdated(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when the fee percentage is updated

FeeRecipientUpdated(address,address).notice: Emitted when the fee recipient is updated

FundsWithdrawn(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when funds are withdrawn by the owner

HeroListed(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a hero is listed for sale

HeroPriceUpdated(uint256,address,uint256.notice: Emitted when a hero's price is updated

HeroPurchased(uint256,address,address,ui.notice: Emitted when a hero is purchased

HeroUnlisted(uint256,address).notice: Emitted when a hero listing is cancelled

MarketplacePaused(address).notice: Emitted when the marketplace is paused

MarketplaceUnpaused(address).notice: Emitted when the marketplace is unpaused

bulkCancelListings(uint256[]).notice: Bulk cancels the listings of multiple heroes

buyHero(uint256).notice: Allows a user to purchase a listed hero

cancelListing(uint256).notice: Cancels the listing of a hero

checkIfHeroIsListed(uint256).notice: Checks if a hero is currently listed for sale

executeFeePercentageUpdate().notice: Executes the proposed fee percentage change after the time-lock period

getDFKHeroContractAddress().notice: Retrieves the address of the DFK hero contract

getDetailedDebugInfo().notice: Retrieves detailed debug information about all heroes

getHONKTokenAddress().notice: Retrieves the address of the HONK token contract

getHero(uint256).notice: Retrieves the details of a specific hero

getHeroIndex(uint256).notice: Gets the index of a hero in the heroes mapping

getHeroesByOwner(address).notice: Retrieves all heroes owned by a specific address

getListedHeroesPaginated(uint256,uint256.notice: Retrieves a paginated list of listed heroes

getMultipleHeroes(uint256[]).notice: Retrieves multiple heroes by their IDs

listHero(uint256,uint256).notice: Lists a hero for sale in the marketplace

paused().notice: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise

setFeeRecipient(address).notice: Sets a new fee recipient address

updatePrice(uint256,uint256).notice: Updates the price of a listed hero

withdrawERC721(address,uint256,address).notice: Allows the owner to withdraw any ERC721 tokens accidentally sent to the contract

withdrawFees(uint256).notice: Allows the owner to withdraw accumulated fees

userdoc.notice: A marketplace contract for trading DFK Heroes using HONK tokens
